Message:
Mimi started going to
that store every day
to learn the dance.

As usual, Mimi peeked
through the window,

but today, one of the
dancers spoke to Mimi!

Mimi wanted
to be just like her,

so Mimi asked the purr-dy
dancer to teach her.

“I’d prefer to live
a free life like yours,
but you want to be like me?”
she smiled.
